jparsec.graph

Class DitaaBoxElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • jparsec.graph.DitaaBoxElement

  • public class DitaaBoxElement
extends java.lang.Object
    A handy class to store boxes for a ditaa diagram.
    Author:
    T. Alonso Albi - OAN (Spain)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  DitaaBoxElement.TYPE
      The different types of shapes.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String color
      Box color.
      java.lang.String connect
      Connections for this box: NSEW for filled points, and nesw for non-filled in each of the 4 possible directions.
      boolean dashed
      True for dashed shape.
      java.lang.String[] text
      Box text.
      DitaaBoxElement.TYPE type
      Box type.

        Box text.

      • color

        public java.lang.String color
        Box color.

      • type

        public DitaaBoxElement.TYPE type
        Box type.

      • connect

        public java.lang.String connect
        Connections for this box: NSEW for filled points, and nesw for non-filled in each of the 4 possible directions.

      • dashed

        True for dashed shape.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DitaaBoxElement

        public DitaaBoxElement(java.lang.String[] t,
               java.lang.String col,
               DitaaBoxElement.TYPE tp,
               java.lang.String c,
               boolean d)
        Constructor for a given shape. For 'no box' type the color and dashed properties are ignored, and the box connections are used to set the text alignment.
        Parameters:
        t - The text inside the shape.
        col - The color.
        tp - The box type.
        c - Box connections.
        d - True for dashed.

    • Method Detail

      • toString

        public java.lang.String[] toString(int w,
                          int h)
        Returns a string representation of this box.
        Parameters:
        w - Width in characters of the box.
        h - Height in characters of the box.
        Returns:
        The string array.
